Structs/ConsoleStyle.html#/s:7Console0A5.name: color
Structs/ConsoleStyle.html#/s:7Console0A5.abstract: Optional text color. If nil, text is plain.

Structs/ConsoleStyle.html#/s:7Console0A5.name: background
Structs/ConsoleStyle.html#/s:7Console0A5.abstract: Optional background color. If nil background is plain.

Structs/ConsoleStyle.html#/s:7Console0A5.name: plain
Structs/ConsoleStyle.html#/s:7Console0A5.abstract: Plain text with no color or background.

Structs/ConsoleStyle.html.name: ConsoleStyle
Structs/ConsoleStyle.html.abstract: Representation of a style for outputting to a Console in different colors with differing attributes.

Structs/ConsoleText.html.name: ConsoleText
Structs/ConsoleText.html.abstract: A collection of ConsoleTextFragments. Represents stylized text that can be outputted

Structs/ConsoleTextFragment.html.name: ConsoleTextFragment
Structs/ConsoleTextFragment.html.abstract: A single piece of ConsoleText. Contains a raw String and the desired ConsoleStyle.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAP4si.name: size
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAP4si.abstract: The size of the Console window. Used for calculating lines printed and centering text.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAP5in.name: input(isSecure:)
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAP5in.abstract: Returns a String of input read from the Console until a line feed character was found.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAP5cl.name: clear(_:)
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAP5cl.abstract: Clears previously printed Console output according to the ConsoleClear type given.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAP6re.name: report(error:newLine:)
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAP6re.abstract: Outputs an error to the Console’s error stream.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: loadingBar(title:)
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: Creates a new LoadingBar-based ActivityIndicator.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: progressBar(title:)
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: Creates a new ProgressBar-based ActivityIndicator.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: clear(lines:)
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: Deletes lines that were previously printed to the terminal.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: pushEphemeral()
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: Pushes a new ephemeral console state. All text outputted to the console immidiately after this call

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: popEphemeral()
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: Pops a previous ephemeral console state. All text outputted to the console immidiately after the last call

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: didOutputLines(count:)
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: This method allows the Console implementation to record how many lines have been printed so

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: ask(_:isSecure:)
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: Requests input from the console after displaying a prompt.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: choose(_:from:)
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: Prompts the user to choose an item from the supplied array. The chosen item will be returned.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: choose(_:from:display:)
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: Prompts the user to choose an item from the supplied array. The chosen item will be returned.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: confirm(_:)
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: Requests yes / no confirmation from the user after a prompt.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: confirmOverride
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: If set, all calls to confirm(_:) will use this value instead of asking the user.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: input()
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: See Console.input(isSecure:)

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: center(_:padding:)
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: Centers a String according to this console’s size.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: center(_:padding:)
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: Centers an array of Strings according to this console’s size.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: output(_:)
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: Outputs serialized ConsoleText to the Console.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: output(_:style:newLine:)
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: Outputs a String to the Console with the specified ConsoleStyle style.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: print(_:newLine:)
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: Outputs a String to the Console with ConsoleStyle.plain style.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: info(_:newLine:)
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: Outputs a String to the Console with ConsoleStyle.info style.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: success(_:newLine:)
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: Outputs a String to the Console with ConsoleStyle.success style.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: warning(_:newLine:)
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: Outputs a String to the Console with ConsoleStyle.warning style.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: error(_:newLine:)
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: Outputs a String to the Console with ConsoleStyle.error style.

Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.name: blockingWait(seconds:)
Protocols/Console.html#/s:7ConsoleAAPAAE.abstract: Blocks the current thread for the specified number of seconds.

Protocols/ActivityIndicatorType.html#/s:.name: outputActivityIndicator(to:state:)
Protocols/ActivityIndicatorType.html#/s:.abstract: Draws / renders this ActivityIndicatorType to the Console for the supplied ActivityIndicatorState.

Protocols/ActivityBar.html#/s:7Console11.name: title
Protocols/ActivityBar.html#/s:7Console11.abstract: The title to display when rendering this ActivityBar.

Protocols/ActivityBar.html#/s:7Console11.name: renderActiveBar(tick:width:)
Protocols/ActivityBar.html#/s:7Console11.abstract: Called each time the ActivityBar should refresh its display.

Protocols/ActivityBar.html#/s:7Console11.name: width
Protocols/ActivityBar.html#/s:7Console11.abstract: Defines the width of all ActivityBars in characters.

Protocols/ActivityBar.html.name: ActivityBar
Protocols/ActivityBar.html.abstract: An ActivityIndicatorType that renders an activity bar on a single line.

Protocols/ActivityIndicatorType.html.name: ActivityIndicatorType
Protocols/ActivityIndicatorType.html.abstract: ActivityIndicatorTypes are responsible for drawing / rendering the current ActivityIndicatorState

Enums/ConsoleClear.html#/s:7Console0A5Cl.name: screen
Enums/ConsoleClear.html#/s:7Console0A5Cl.abstract: Clears the entire viewable area of the Console.

Enums/ConsoleClear.html#/s:7Console0A5Cl.name: line
Enums/ConsoleClear.html#/s:7Console0A5Cl.abstract: Deletes the last line that was printed to the Console.

Enums/ActivityIndicatorState.html#/s:7Co.name: ready
Enums/ActivityIndicatorState.html#/s:7Co.abstract: Default state. This is usually never used other than for initialization.

Enums/ActivityIndicatorState.html#/s:7Co.name: active
Enums/ActivityIndicatorState.html#/s:7Co.abstract: Active state. The indicator should appear active or loading during this state.

Enums/ActivityIndicatorState.html#/s:7Co.name: success
Enums/ActivityIndicatorState.html#/s:7Co.abstract: Success state. The indicator should show that the operation succeeded.

Enums/ActivityIndicatorState.html#/s:7Co.name: failure
Enums/ActivityIndicatorState.html#/s:7Co.abstract: Fail state. The indicator should show that the operation failed.

Classes/ActivityIndicator.html#/s:7Conso.name: start(on:)
Classes/ActivityIndicator.html#/s:7Conso.abstract: Starts the ActivityIndicator. Usually this means beginning the associated loading animation.

Classes/ActivityIndicator.html#/s:7Conso.name: fail()
Classes/ActivityIndicator.html#/s:7Conso.abstract: Stops the ActivityIndicator, yielding a failed / error appearance.

Classes/ActivityIndicator.html#/s:7Conso.name: succeed()
Classes/ActivityIndicator.html#/s:7Conso.abstract: Stops the ActivityIndicator, yielding a success / done appearance.

Classes/ActivityIndicator.html.name: ActivityIndicator
Classes/ActivityIndicator.html.abstract: An instance of a ActivityIndicatorType that can be started, failed, and succeeded.

Classes/Terminal.html.name: Terminal
Classes/Terminal.html.abstract: Generic console that uses a mixture of Swift standard
